Package org.apfloat.internal

Class IntShortConvolutionStrategy

java.lang.Object
org.apfloat.internal.IntBaseMath
org.apfloat.internal.IntShortConvolutionStrategy
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, ConvolutionStrategy
public class IntShortConvolutionStrategy extends IntBaseMath implements ConvolutionStrategy
Short convolution strategy. Performs a simple multiplication when the size of one operand is 1.
Version:
1.9.0
Author:
Mikko Tommila
See Also:
